Detailed Description

Abstract class which returns the mass blowing rate for a heterogeneous reactions.

It is the base of a Null object (not used yet) which returns zero blow flux. This is important for the case of purely catalytic or oxidation reactions. In the case where ablative reactions take place, a solid class ablation is available.
